properties.name: Awakening
properties.description: Posted by MadelineclaireTillman ParkThis is where the universe unravelled. This is the reason I am able to get out of bed every morning. This is the reason I don\'t ask questions. This is the reason I am who I am. (it has nothing to do with god or jesus)

properties.name: Eerie NY
properties.description: Posted by MadelineclaireLily DaleI love Lily Dale. My mother\'s friend is a 3rd generation clairvoyant there, and it is the strangest place on Earth, except maybe for Sedona, AZ.

properties.name: First Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Madelineclaire325 Summer St, Buffalo, NYThis was my first apartment. The apartment itself wasn\'t so great (although it did have a roof-porch, but you had to climb out one of the windows to get to it), but the location was awesome. Right in the middle of all the goings-ons of Elmwood and Allentown. I lived there with my cat, my then-boyfriend, and a friend from high school for a year. Good times.

properties.name: First Love
properties.description: Posted by Madelineclaire 4407 Overlook Dr, Williamsville, NY, 14221This is where I met my frist "true love"... and where he grew up and lived until it was foreclosed last winter. We\'ll wait and see if I find another...

properties.name: Gateway
properties.description: Posted by MadelineclaireAmherst State ParkThis is where I first used any illegal substance. Oh gateway drugs. It was in April, 1999- 8th grade. Me, my best friend, and two other hoodlums smoked pot out of a cheap, pink, metal pipe. Then I ate peanut butter. I didn\'t have the munchies, but it was a good excuse to eat peanut butter.

properties.name: Higher Grounds
properties.description: Posted by Madelineclaire3622 Sheridan Drive, Amherst, NY, 14226This is where our writing group meets every Monday night. It was started in October, 2004 by Pete, who later moved to California, but it\'s still going strong! Lots of awesome people doing awesome things, and really honestly helping each other grow as writers.

properties.name: Home
properties.description: Posted by Madelineclaire 100 LosRobles St, Williamsville, NY, 14221This is the house where I grew up, in the safest town in America. The outside is dark and scary, and the inside looks like a Pier 1. My parents still live there, and chances are I\'ll live there again some day :P

properties.name: Marshmallows
properties.description: Posted by Madelineclairewoods...This is where I first did acid... it was boring and definitely not all it was cracked up to be. But I did have a startling moment of clarity about the cycle of life when I was holding a newt and thought it had died in my hand. (It hadn\'t)

properties.name: Second Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Madelineclaire454 Minnesota Ave, Buffalo, NYAfter living at home again for a year, I moved out with my ex-boyfriend and his brother into this apartment. It\'s awesome. It has fluorescent walls. But, it didn\'t work out domestically with me and the brother. And my bedroom was the size of a closet, and it didn\'t have a closet.

properties.name: There is no Hell like an old Hell
properties.description: Posted by MadelineclaireWilliamsville South High SchoolThis is where I went to high school. This is where I hated life for four years.

properties.name: Third Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Madelineclaire362 Huntington Ave, Buffalo, NYThis is where I moved to after not getting along at Minnesota Ave. It\'s a small one bedroom, but the neighborhood is much nicer and quieter.
